Objective.title: Objective
Objective.description: A Canadian poet, novelist, literary critic, essayist, teacher, environmental activist, and inventor.

Education.title: Harvard University
Education.desc: Recipient of the Woodrow Wilson Fellowship, Master's degree in English Literature from Radcliffe College

Education.title: University of Toronto
Education.desc: Studied at Victoria College resulting in a major in English with a double-minor in French and Philosophy

Experience.title: The Handmaid's Tale
Experience.desc: A futuristic dystopian novel exploring themes of subjugated women in a patriarchal society, and the various means by which women resist and try to gain individuality and independence

Experience.title: University of Toronto
Experience.desc: Shared professional insights with faculty, mentored students, hosted workshops, developed content

Experience.title: University of British Coloumbia
Experience.desc: Course instructor in English classes (ENGL319, ENGL340, ENGL315) in the Faculty of Creative and Cultural Studies.
